segments.text: Do I have to get up now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better get up or you'll be late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you talking about ? The alarm hasn't even gone off yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , It has . It went off 30 minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must have slept right through it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just let me sleep five more minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
